articles.title: 'Copper is the new oil,' and prices could soar 50% as AI, green energy, and military spending boost demand, top commodities analyst says - Fortune

articles.title: Dollar rally falters as falling inflation raises hopes of rate cuts - Financial Times
articles.description: US currency on track for first negative month of the year after end to months of above-forecast CPI data
articles.content:
A rally in the US dollar this year has gone into reverse as investors bet that falling inflation in the worlds largest economy will give the Federal Reserve more room to cut interest rates.
